import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import AuthContext from '../../AuthContext' import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' const IndividualPost = ({postSet}) => { const {state,dispatch} = useContext(AuthContext) const {username,allPosts} = state console.log("postSet:") console.log(postSet) return (
{/*
{post._id}
{post.title}
{post.content}
Written by:{post.username}
Likes:{post.likes}

    {post.comments.map((sub,idx) =>
  • {sub.commenter == username ? ( editComment({sub})}>edit):null} {editMode && edit_id === sub._id ? () :(
    {sub.content}
    )}
    by: {sub.commenter}
    by: {sub._id}
    Date posted: {formatDate(sub.createdDate)}
    Comment likes: {sub.likes}

    • )}
*/} ) } export default withRouter(IndividualPost)
